name: eagle-line-bus-management
description: Robust bus management system for Eagle Line

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && cd ../client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
